name: channor/laravel-positionable
description: The `laravel-positionable` package offers an elegant and straightforward way to manage and dynamically adjust the display order of models in Laravel applications. It simplifies the implementation of sortable entities, enabling developers to easily define, update, and retrieve models based on their position or order in a list. Perfect for any application requiring ordered elements, such as galleries, sortable lists, or prioritized records, `laravel-positionable` seamlessly integrates with Laravel's Eloquent models, providing a fluent and intuitive API for handling model positions.
